channel.title: Can I use ProXPN to host a server? (Also a job that's paying that I need done.)
channel.description:
Non-paying job: Can I use ProXPN to host a server?
Paying Job(29 cents (all I have atm)) I need my server setup (as in IP changed everything to do for I can give people the client to play) Only if I can portforward with ProXPN
